artist: Artist: Jody Williams; Publisher: Flying Paper Press, Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer
description: small rectangular wooden box (red with black dots and zigzags) which contains an attached accordion-folded paper book with text at bottom of gray pages and abstract black lines with colored geometric shapes; string and Asian-style tab closure
provenance: Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer, Orono, Minn.; given to MIA, 2004
title: Time Will Tell
